name: Merge Block 3D: Number Puzzle
description:
Merge Block 3D is a remix of number merge, bubble shooting and match-3 games, all great mechanics are in this fantastic puzzle game.

Empty your head, relax and immerse yourself in the world of 3D puzzles.
Swipe & shoot block to merge with same kind of block and make bigger one. How biggest block can you make?
TRY IT RIGHT NOW!

* HOW TO PLAY:
- Swipe left and right to fire when released
- When the same blocks are combined, it merges to a higher block.
- Use items with amazing effects such as Hammer and Spanner.
- Try to make the block as high as you can.

* FEATURES:
- FREE TO PLAY and suitable for all ages.
- NO penalties & time limits, you can enjoy block puzzle at your own pace.
- NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Enjoy Merge Block 3D anytime, anywhere

Let's enjoy the game with your family!
If you have some good ideas about MERGE BLOCK 3D, please send us a feedback in the game at support@lihuhugames.com
